scripts.build: if [ -d build ]; then rm -r build; fi; npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:nobuild
scripts.dev: COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=nodecube-example PORT=8030 DEBUG_PORT=8130 AUTO_RESTART=no CUSTOM_CMD="npm run start" docker-compose -f ./node_modules/nodecube/configs/docker-compose-dev.yml -f configs/docker-compose-dev.override.yml up
scripts.dev:debug: COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=nodecube-example PORT=8030 DEBUG_PORT=8130 AUTO_RESTART=no CUSTOM_CMD="npm run debug" docker-compose -f ./node_modules/nodecube/configs/docker-compose-dev.yml -f configs/docker-compose-dev.override.yml up
scripts.dev:test: COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=nodecube-example PORT=8030 DEBUG_PORT=8130 AUTO_RESTART=no CUSTOM_CMD="npm run test" docker-compose -f ./node_modules/nodecube/configs/docker-compose-dev.yml -f configs/docker-compose-dev.override.yml up
scripts.dev:rebuild: npm run dev:reset; npm run dev:test
scripts.dev:empty: docker rm -f nodecube-example-redis nodecube-example-mongo nodecube-example-mongoimport nodecube-example-mysql; docker rmi nodecube-example-mongoimport
scripts.dev:reset: docker rm -f nodecube-example-service; docker rmi nodecube-example-service; npm run dev:empty
